column4: “{3,2,4}” so they’re all panned with 3 (in the middle)
column8: “{4,3}” so 4’s note from the previous section isn’t interrupted
column12: FF 4 needs to carry over from the previous section so its note isn’t interrupted
column18: VP1 needs to stay on one track for its full duration

column6: FF {3,2,4} needs to become 4 or else a note gets chopped in half
